altername_name: Unou Kaiten: Match Bou Puzzle DS
右脑回转 - 火柴棒解谜DS
name: Matchstick
overview: Matchstick features more than 150 puzzles with three difficulty settings, making it easy to pick up but challenging to master! Using the stylus to move and rotate the matches on screen, puzzles range from mathematical and wordbased problems to Roman numeral and shapes challenges! 3 different difficulty levels 2 modes – Time Attack and Normal Use the stylus to move and rotate the matches on screen Puzzles ranging from mathematical and word based problems to Roman numeral and shapes Simple to use, but fiendish to complete
